DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY IN BANKRUPTCY
DOC.TEXT: THE KEY PLAYERS Robert L . Citron : Resigned after 24 years as county treasurer-tax collector when his risky investment strategy forced Orange County government to file for Bankruptcy Court protection . William G . Steiner : The county supervisor accused federal securities regulators of sitting idle when they might have rescued the county from having to file for bankruptcy protection . Thomas F . Riley : The former Marine brigadier_general chairs the Orange County Board of Supervisors , which approved the historic bankruptcy decision . Ernie Schneider : The county ' s chief administrative officer moved Citron aside and took_control of the investment portfolio as supervisors debated whether to file bankruptcy .
